Klasse LoginController

java.lang.Object
controllers.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Controller for handling user login and registration navigation. Connects to the RMI-based account server for authentication.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • LoginController

      public LoginController() throws Exception
      Initializes the RMI registry and looks up the account server.
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI connection fails
      NotBoundException - if "AccountServer" not found in registry
      Exception
